product_name: Gerber Bear Grylls Compact Fire Starter
long_description: The Bear Grylls Compact Fire Starter from Gerber is a quick and easy way to start a campfire, even in rainy, windy conditions. Simple, 2-piece design is easy to use; ferrocerium rod produces high quality, fire-starting sparks. Easy-grip, polypropylene overmold protects the ferrocerium rod against the elements. Paracord lanyard attaches the fire starter to your keychain, backpack, or even a jacket zipper. Weighing less than an ounce, the Gerber Bear Grylls Compact Fire Starter is easy to take anywhere.
short_description: The Bear Grylls Compact Fire Starter from Gerber is a quick and easy way to start a campfire, even in rainy, windy conditions.
